item.description:
Join us for our first-ever holiday party. What we're celebrating is simple: beer. And sure, it's "that" time of season (some of us love it; others love to hate it). Regardless of decked halls and fruit baskets, let's nix the ordinary for a day of brunch, beer and boisterous convo.

Not known to many as a beer bar, our venue has a surprising amount of crafts on tap and in bottles. And with the winter ales debuting soon, it's the perfect time to whet your whistle and discover one of Boston's best kept secrets. (Not to worry; it's walking distance from Gov't Center and State Street T stops).

Oh, and did I mention there may be a guest appearance? Fingers crossed!

For a small $10 donation, you get...

- a spot at the table of holiday revelry

- exclusive tastings of hand-selected beers (including a White Chocolate Ale from my own collection, along with the generous bar manager's personally chosen few)

- a frothy first pint at no charge

- 10% off your food order (brunch or otherwise)

- entry into the holiday raffle (c'mon, no whammies!)

- a special take-home surprise from yours truly (no peeking!)

- and, last but not least, the braggin' rights to say you were there!
item.name: Beer & Brunch Holiday Party
